name: Hardest "The Ranch": Part Seven Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Luke and Mary go on their honeymoon after getting married in Vegas in "Dyin' To See Her"?
questions.explanation:
Gun range.

	Luke and Mary were seen shooting guns and doing drugs while at a gun range on their honeymoon. They were shooting everything from handguns to assault weapons. Luke said the gun range had a honeymoon package.

questions.text: In "I Wish You'd Stay", how did Abby say she and Colt met?
questions.correct: Colt shoved her into a locker
options: Abby tutored him in every subject
Colt was a quarterback; Abby was a cheerleader
Colt hit her with a football
questions.explanation:
Colt shoved her into a locker.

	Abby mentioned how she and Colt met when Abby was talking to Colt about attending a book fair with her at Maggie's. Colt didn't want to go because he thought it was too nerdy, but he showed up anyway.

questions.text: While living in Rooster's cabin, what fast food item did Luke find in the freezer in "Waitin' On A Woman"?
questions.explanation:
McRibs.

	Luke opened the freezer and found it full of McRibs. He looked up at the sky and told Rooster he wished they had met before Rooster died. When Heather showed up at the cabin to talk to Luke, he lied and told Heather there was no food in the house.

questions.text: After Joanne refused Beau's proposal in "Remind Me", what disease did she admit to Beau that she had?
questions.explanation:
Alzheimer's disease.

	Joanne refused to marry Beau. Later while they were on the porch, Joanne told Beau why she refused his marriage proposal. She went to the doctor after she couldn't remember how to get home from her walk around the lake. He diagnosed her with Alzheimer's disease.

questions.text: In "Love and War", after speaking to Dale, Beau proposed to Joanne again.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Beau told Dale about Joanne's prognosis. Dale told Joanne that Charlene was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease and because of that diagnosis they spend as much time together as they can. After their talk, Joanne proposed to Beau and he accepted. They married in the front yard of the ranch.

questions.text: After Colt's lies and constant arguing, who asked for a divorce first: Abby or Colt in "The Devil's Alive and Well"?
options: Both said the word at the same time
questions.explanation:
Colt.

	After continued arguing back and forth, Colt brought up the word while they were arguing on the front porch. Abby was shocked that he brought it up. Abby, however, was the person that brought Colt the divorce papers.

questions.text: Luke found Rooster's zombie invasion kit inside the wall at the cabin in "Last Time For Everything". What was inside the bag?
options: Picture of Dale Earnhardt, six pack of beer, and a gun
questions.explanation:
Beer and gun.

	Luke was taking a deer head off the wall because he didn't like the head looking at him and that's when he found Rooster's bag with a gun and a beer inside. When Mary showed up at the cabin, she told Luke it was Rooster's zombie invasion kit. He also had an "Elect Hillary Clinton" bag and a North Korea invasion bag.

questions.text: In "Without A Fight", when Lisa Neumann pressed theft charges against Colt, what did Beau give her in exchange for dropping the charges against Colt?
options: He would make sure Colt left town for good
Beau would work for her for the entirety of his life
questions.explanation:
Iron River ranch.

	Lisa blamed Colt for her bull making it into Colt's cows. It was actually Beau who let the bull into Colt's cows. When Lisa Neumann pressed charges against Colt, Beau went to Neumann's Hill and gave her Iron River ranch. He and Joanne had sixty days before they had to move out.

questions.text: What restaurant company did Colt agree to sell one hundred of his cows to along with three other ranchers in "Welcome To The Future"?
questions.explanation:
Outback.

	Colt didn't have four hundred cows to give Outback so he went together with three other ranches to give one hundred cows each. As long as Outback got the cows, they didn't care who gave them the four hundred cows so they accepted the offer.

questions.text: In "Perfect Storm", who did Colt say he would want to play him in a movie based on the Bennett family?
questions.explanation:
Channing Tatum.

	Colt, Beau and Luke were headed to a casino for some male bonding. They were crammed into Luke's El Camino when Colt mentioned that he wanted Channing Tatum to play him if they ever made a movie about them.
